H0.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Top Hat

H1.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Newsboy Cap

H2.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Fedora

H3.text: What item of headwear is associated with Sherlock Holmes. Deerstalker

A4.text: the original illustrations for the stories by Sidney Paget (who favored a deerstalker himself) in the United Kingdom, and Frederic Dorr Steele in the United States, along with other illustrators of the period, depicted Holmes as a 'deerstalker man', which then became the popular perception of him.
